successes.title: Blue Laser Lamp- with passive cooling technology
successes.description: A sleek new lamp design, using passively cooled, blue laser technology. Illuminate the world with less than 1 watt of household energy.

Pledges.description: Firefly inventor Richard will send you a personal postcard from his location in Apex, NC - a town not far geographically or characteristically from Andy Griffith's Mayberry (The Andy Griffith Show televised October 3, 1960, and April 1, 1968). Postcard mailed anywhere.

With this add-on you'll receive a star pattern removable, reusable lens for your Firefly. (see update #9 for details). The lens allows you to transform the standard dot pattern of the Firefly into a swath of stars.

Firefly Tee!
Add this to your wardrobe! Backer T-Shirt printed on both sides with blue laser label and acknowledgement “I am a Backer! Kickstarter Blue Laser 2013”.
Includes shipping everywhere, See sample image in the update section

EARLY BIRD!
Be the first to own a Blue Firefly Laser Lamp and take advantage of the Early Bird value!
(Free Shipping U.S.!)

ADVANCE!
If you missed out on the Early Bird you can still own the Blue Firefly Laser Lamp at a fraction of the normal cost. ($5 Shipping U.S.!)

RECOVER! If your pledge was canceled for multiple units $106 you can still own a Blue Firefly Laser Lamp. (Free shipping USA/Canada). Use pledges more than once for more.
International shipping add $35, We will notice if you pledge more than once and save you on shipping.

If you missed the RECOVER show support and donate a dollar more and get a Blue Firefly Laser Lamp. (Free shipping USA/Canada).  International shipping add $35, We will notice if you pledge more than once and save you on shipping.

BLACK FIREFLY! If you didn't get to the advance order don't fret! You still have a chance to own a Firefly Laser Lamp from the First Batch. (Free Shipping U.S. and Canada!) International shipping add $35
WHITE FIREFLY!! Own the WHITE version of the Firefly Laser Lamp. Same Blue laser; beautiful white shell. (Free Shipping U.S. and Canada!) International shipping add $35

ENCORE Level - by popular demand: For those of you just arriving at the blue laser party, this level allows you to get a single unit in your choice of black or white shell at a bit less than the combo unit. We wish we could keep offering the earlier prices to everyone, but our source for the solid state quantum tunnel for lasing material raised their price. So for a September batch we have to consider that. We're still subsidizing the manufacturing because we really want to share this blue laser with the world! Encore! Encore! 
(Free Shipping U.S. And Canada!) International shipping add $35.

FIRST BATCH!
If you didn't get to the advance order don't fret! You still have a chance to own a Firefly Laser Lamp from the First Batch. (Free Shipping U.S. and Canada!)

Combo package. This level includes your choice of white or black Firefly AND the add-on star pattern lens. (Free Shipping U.S. And Canada!)
International shipping add $35.

UNLOCKED! The HEART Firefly Combo - Your choice of Black or White Firefly lamp plus an attachable heart patterned lens. We wanted to show some love to our awesome backers who've helped us reach $350K. We will now start making these custom lenses specially etched to maintain the holographic quality of the laser light. Designed to be easily attached and unattached for reuse, this lens will fill your rooms with love! International shipping please add $35.

BFF combo package: With this level you get your choice of white or black model blue laser Firefly * the blue laser t-shirt * AND Star pattern lens. (Free Shipping U.S. And Canada!)
International shipping add $35.

Historical Archive Pledge!
Get a blue laser lamp Firefly in white or black case, signed by the inventor and a crystal commemorative plaque mounted with the unique technology flower heat spreader and your name engraved as a supporter on Kickstarter. See a sample plaque in the updates section.
(Free Shipping U.S. and Internationally!)

LAST CHANCE Historical Archive Pledge! Get a blue laser lamp Firefly in white or black case, signed by the inventor and a crystal commemorative plaque mounted with the unique technology flower heat spreader and your name engraved as a supporter on Kickstarter. See a sample plaque in the updates section. (Free Shipping U.S. and Internationally

Let's celebrate! You and a friend are invited to a private dinner with Richard at his favorite local restaurant. This restaurant is the winner of numerous awards serving unique combination of gourmet and fusion cuisine. Included is airfare from within the continental US to RDU International Airport, one night at the Sheraton Imperial Hotel, transportation to and from the airport and restaurant, blue Firefly laser lamp signed by inventor, and a commemorative plaque. Location is in the heart of Carolina, Research Triangle Park area. Forget any shipping;  you will be handed a blue laser firefly in person made by the inventor (made in the USA), you will also be handed two T-shirts (color and size will be needed) and the commemorative plaque shown in the updates. Delivery immediate after the campaign, be the first with the product in your hand.
